SEARCH
Package com.virtualbankv2.entity

Class Task

java.lang.Object
com.virtualbankv2.entity.Task
public class Task extends Object
The Task class represents a task in the system, including details such as task ID, description, title, start and end dates, associated user, reward, and completion status.
Since:
2024-04-13
Version:
2.0
Author:
Zhenghan Zhong

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(String description, double reward, String title, String start, String end, String userName)
      Constructs a new Task with the specified description, reward, title, start date, end date, and username.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the task
      reward - the reward for completing the task
      title - the title of the task
      start - the start date of the task
      end - the end date of the task
      userName - the username of the user associated with the task

    • Task

      public Task(String taskID, String description, double reward, boolean isCompleted, int counter, String start, String end, String title, String userName)
      Constructs a new Task with the specified values.
      Parameters:
      taskID - the ID of the task
      description - the description of the task
      reward - the reward for completing the task
      isCompleted - whether the task is completed
      counter - the counter for the specific task
      start - the start date of the task
      end - the end date of the task
      title - the title of the task
      userName - the username of the user associated with the task
